snippet.title: Amber Heard is Innocent 2 - Johnny Depp, Domestic Abuse, Hollywood, Hate & Equality
snippet.description:
#AmberHeard was threatened with a knife by #JohnnyDepp, was hit multiple times in #DomesticViolence and physically injured, and yet experiences online hate and discrimination. Witnesses of the domestic abuse refused to speak publicly because of the #Hollywood and cultural setting which doesn't reward helping victims - even if it's the right thing to do.

In this video, Amber Heard is threatened by Johnny Depp with a knife after she refuses to cut him when he asks her to, and he mocks her about scars and going to court. A video shows JD saying he headbutted Amber, but "that wouldn't break a nose."

A photo of missing Anthony Fox was sent by an alleged romantic partner of ex-staff saying staff are threatened with it since he wanted to testify against Depp. Similarly, #EvanRachelWood who was abused by JD's best friend #MarilynManson is shown reading a testimony that Manson threatened people if they wanted to expose him and threatened Evan with killing himself, yet at the same time violently abusing her and causing fear for numerous people.
She passed Phoenix Act: http://PhoenixAct.com

This video links Hollywood/ #LosAngeles culture (claiming women want fame and they shouldn't stand up for victims), Hate Online for being a woman and sexuality/LGBT identities, and covering up abuse with bystanders.

#Hollaback is shown encouraging interfering to stop abuse and Duty to Rescue Law to create liability for not helping others.

HUMANITARIAN WORK:
Amber Heard is a #UnitedNations Human Rights Champion, ACLU Women's Rights Ambassador, and leader.

SUPPORT HER in #Aquaman 2!: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2


Stop violence against women with technology!

From a Diary entry from Amber Heard: 
"Johnny… at one point found himself with his shirt wrapped around my neck... I don’t even know how I wound up with this huge, rather annoying knot on the back of my head. F--k, I hate that..."
Article: https://www.ibtimes.com/amber-heard-details-alleged-terrible-fight-johnny-depp-now-public-diary-entry-3011531 

JD stated in leaked Audio 2 from a 2015 marriage tape that they "had a physical fight on the train" during their honeymoon as well as in San Francisco.
Video: https://youtu.be/ibiPJvTTMXA?t=77


JOURNALIST Nick Wallis is regularly live-tweeting quotes from UK COURT case of Depp vs NGN:  

A bodyguard told Amber that if he didn't interfere, then either Amber would be dead or JD would be dead, showing that deadly physical violence existed against AH: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281220109974016005

"A series of texts between AH and a friend “I need you - J beat me up pretty good - Rox on the couch now - I’m hurt. I don’t know what... to do" https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281248771544940545

"QC in this photo a candelabra is on the floor. you did that...
QC: in this photo on 16 Dec 2015 of Ms Heard - 2 black eyes coming up...
QC: and some injuries around her nose and mouth."
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281242906666381313

Texts between JD and AH read by QC: “The only reason we go for the throat is love” and she says “my throat is yours” and you says “I have other uses for your throat that don’t involve injury” and she says “you’re going to be... the death of me."
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1280831219618512896

Other Quotes from Court:

Staff are there to keep things quiet and out of the press: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281218000385966081
Security did not enter during JD's damage worth 5 figures to Australian house: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217616531591168
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217047922446336
Scratches were seen on AH's arms after their fight in AU, acknowledged by JD: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281194747294560258
JD said in audio he harmed himself, yelling abuse to AH and blaming her for it (also in this video she later is sobbing): https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281192723387744259
JD has bloody knuckles from destroying furniture: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281161362660614144
JD kicked and damaged his trailer: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281163413993947136
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281162449849405440
Crushing injury, not related to velocity: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281227233080868866
JD says he hits objects and blacks out: 
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281161930107912193
Incorrectly timed meds only 45 min off: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281157454303297536
AH called heroic for taking care of JD: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281156000251346944


Robbie Kaplan: "... imagine what happens every single day to the millions of other women out there who have been abused or assaulted and are not famous actresses and don’t have the resources to hire lawyers to defend them." https://twitter.com/kaplanrobbie/status/1281938991953195009

#GenderEquality #LGBT #Equality #Charity #Superhero #ACLU
